name: quiz-react-percy-jackson
description: A quiz of Percy Jackson and The Olympians used Node.js, Typescript and MongoDB
author: Rodrigo Zan

scripts.git_user: git config user.name 'Rodrigo Zan' && git config user.email 'rodzandonadi@gmail.com'
scripts.push: npm run add && npm run commit && git push origin master
scripts.api_folders: mkdir src && mkdir src/controllers && mkdir src/models && mkdir src/services && mkdir config && mkdir database && mkdir utils
scripts.api_files_config: touch config/express.js && touch database/mongodb.js && touch server.js && touch .env.local && touch .env.example && touch .gitignore && touch src/routes.js
scripts.api_files_users: touch src/controllers/users.controller.js && touch src/services/user.service.js && touch src/models/users.model.js
scripts.api_dependencies: yarn add express mongoose dotenv jsonwebtoken cors bcryptjs
scripts.api_create_structury: npm run api_folders && npm run api_files_config && npm run api_files_users && npm run api_dependencies && npm run api_dev_dependencies
